= ARM9 Compilation =

  # You need to get the last svn version of [http://pjsip.org pjsip].
  # You need to download the patch for pjsip
  # Apply the patch
{{{
   patch -p0
}}}
  # Define in compile.sh the path of DEVKITPRO and DEVKITARM
  # compile
{{{
   ./compile.sh
}}}
